description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8pu3b","text":"The AllPrep DNA/RNA Mini Kit is designed to purify genomic DNA and total RNA simultaneously from a single biological sample. Lysate is first passed through an AllPrep DNA spin column to selectively isolate DNA and then through an RNeasy spin column to selectively isolate RNA. Pure DNA and RNA are purified from the entire sample, in contrast to other procedures where either the biological sample or the purified total nucleic acids is divided into two before being processed separately. The kit is compatible with small amounts of a wide range of animal cells and tissues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acllp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9343b","text":"The AllPrep DNA/RNA Mini Kit allows the parallel processing of multiple samples in less than 40 minutes. Time-consuming and tedious methods, such as CsCl step-gradient ultracentrifugation and alcohol precipitation steps, or methods involving the use of toxic substances, such as phenol and/or chloroform, are replaced by the AllPrep DNA/RNA procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"coej7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3d8pk","text":"Genomic DNA purified with the AllPrep DNA/RNA procedure has an average length of 15–30 kb depending on homogenization conditions. DNA of this length is particularly suitable for PCR, where complete denaturation of the template is important to achieve the highest amplification efficiency. The purified DNA is ready to use in any downstream application, including:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7elch","text":"Next-generation sequencing (NGS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41pup","text":"PCR","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6p5oe","text":"Southern, dot and slot blot analyses","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3alga","text":"Comparative genome hybridization (CGH)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24keq","text":"Genotyping, SNP analysis","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5s7v","text":"Add   of   to Lysing Matrix E tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3hv59","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"24683910E1F511EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":119984,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Buffer RLT Plus","linfor":"","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/shop/lab-basics/buffers-and-reagents/buffer-rlt-plus/#orderinginformation","sku":"1053393","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"10F04930E1F611EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":25,"name":"Qiagen","link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jb79","text":"Place the entire tissue or a portion into Lysing Matrix E tubes for homogenization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"et73l","text":"For Swab(s): pick up with tweezers and cut with surgical scissors sterilized in a Germinator 500. Place the cut end of a single swab into the Lysing Matrix E tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53nrg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48oro","text":"For Nasal Lavage(s): Thoroughly thaw the lavage and pipette up and down 6 times. Then transfer   of the lavage to the Lysing Matrix E tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":95,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7s6rd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"35D0DB80E1F511EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fvnmd","text":"Homogenize the lysate in Buffer RLT Plus (do not use more than 30 mg of tissue).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3tfb9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mkls","text":"Centrifuge the lysate for   at maximum speed. Carefully remove supernatant by pipetting and transfer it to the All-Prep DNA spin column placed in a 2mL collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":26,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"v4qd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"583E5580E1F511EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9t2dh","text":"Close the lid gently, and centrifuge for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"31gd8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq46g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2lo77","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"64949920E1F511EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10.000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"74AEE9A0E1F511EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"2dhf8","text":"Note: Make sure that no liquid remains on the column membrane after centrifugation. If necessary, repeat the centrifugation until all liquid has passed through the membrane.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a7019","text":"Use a homogenizer designed for Lysing Matrix E tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5frg7","text":"Use a disruption setting that works best for your tissue (i.e. fecal, lung, etc).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8vl4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66pad","text":"Place the All-Prep DNA spin column in a new 2mL collection tube, and store at room temperature (15-25C) or a   for later DNA purification in the following steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":109,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8djiu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30vfq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2shu4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"19028510E1F711EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"en5v","text":"Note: Do not store the All-Prep DNA spin column at room temperature or at 4C for long periods of time. Do not freeze the column.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"er0lp","text":"Add 1 volume (~1x) of 70% Ethanol to the flowthrough from step 5 and mix well by pipetting. Do not centrifuge. Proceed immediately to step 7.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73grr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mmrf","text":"If some lysate was lost during homogenization, adjust the volume of ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28vr4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe9p","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f55a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1pdiu","text":"Note: Precipitates may be visible after addition of ethanol, but this does not affect the procedure. For maximum RNA yields from live, use 50% ethanol instead of 70%.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"792fu","text":"Transfer up to   of the sample, including any precipitate that may have formed, to a RNeasy spin column placed in a 2mL collection tube. Close the lid gently, and centrifuge for   at  . Discard the flowthrough.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":178,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":183,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3k57s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"B7C3EAB0E1F511EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"E9DDB120E1F511EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10.000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EB5CD710E1F511EC9B82E16366BDCFC8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4e2e","text":"Reuse the collection tube in step 8.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djs1a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8pnd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"br7em","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":5,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"7q2ip","text":"Note: If the sample volume exceeds 700uL, centrifuge successive aliquots in the same RNeasy spin column. Discard the flow-through after each centrifugation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
